snippet.title: Teaser Forest Of Perdition 2 - The School Trip
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3147230/Forest_Of_Perdition_2__The_School_Trip/Forest of Perdition 2: The School Trip
is a psychological horror game where a school trip to a haunted park uncovers dark family secrets and a vengeful spirit seeking revenge.


Summary

James Everhart, a high school senior, goes on a school trip to the abandoned Tranquil Hills park. As he and his friends explore the area, mysterious disappearances and supernatural events begin to occur. James uncovers dark secrets about his family and a vengeful spirit that must be stopped. He must make the right choices to survive and save his friends.
Gameplay

Focused on exploration, puzzle-solving, and immersive storytelling. Players explore the abandoned park, interact with characters, collect items, and face psychological horror elements while unraveling the mysteries of Tranquil Hills.
Key Features

• Atmospheric environment and PS1-style graphics.
• VHS film aesthetic.
• NPC interactions.
• Puzzle-solving and exploration of an abandoned park.
• Immersive narrative with multiple endings.
